meanings.definition: Resembling a sac in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The balloon animal had a saclike body.
meanings.sent2: The seed pod was saclike in appearance.
meanings.sent3: The saclike cloud looked like a fluffy pillow in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was so full it bulged out in a saclike manner.
meanings.sent5: The saclike shape of the jellyfish made it easy to identify in the water.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a sac.
meanings.sent1: The saclike structure of the tent provided ample space inside.
meanings.sent2: The saclike container held all the marbles securely.
meanings.sent3: The saclike balloon floated gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent4: The saclike pockets of the jacket kept his hands warm.
meanings.sent5: The saclike shape of the hot air balloon amazed the spectators.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or resembling a sac.
meanings.sent1: The saclike growth on the tree was filled with sap.
meanings.sent2: The saclike structure of the building provided a unique architectural design.
meanings.sent3: The saclike flower petals held a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent4: The saclike packaging protected the fragile items during shipping.
meanings.sent5: The saclike appearance of the rock formation puzzled the geologists.
